channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 随着选举临近，台湾报道更多中国军事活动
item.description: Taiwan reported Chinese warplanes and warships around the island on Saturday, including aircraft crossing the sensitive median line of the Taiwan Strait, as Beijing continues military activities with three weeks to go before Taiwan votes.翻译:台湾周六报道称，中国战机和军舰在台湾周围，包括飞机穿越台湾海峡敏感的中线，距离台湾投票还有三周时间，北京仍在继续军事活动。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国确定1400亿美元支出计划中的第二批项目
item.description: China's top planning body said on Saturday it had identified a second batch of public investment projects, including flood control and disaster relief programmes, under a bond issuance and investment plan announced in October to boost the economy.翻译:中国最高规划机构周六表示，根据10月份宣布的旨在提振经济的债券发行和投资计划，已确定了第二批公共投资项目，包括防洪和救灾项目。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 安哥拉退出欧佩克为更多中国投资开辟道路
item.description: Angola, for which oil constitutes 90% of exports, is seeking to diversify its economy, but it also needs revenue. "China stands out as a pivotal and proven partner," its foreign minister had said.翻译:石油占安哥拉出口的 90%，该国正在寻求经济多元化，但也需要收入。 “中国是一个举足轻重且经过验证的合作伙伴，”其外交部长表示。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 台湾副总统领跑者表示，我们不会让与中国发生战争
item.description: Taiwan's ruling party will not let war break out with China, but it is China that is to blame for stirring up tensions, Taipei's former top diplomat in the United States and now frontrunner to become its next vice president, said on Friday.翻译:台北前驻美国最高外交官、现任台湾下一任副总统的领跑者周五表示，台湾执政党不会让与中国爆发战争，但挑起紧张局势的罪魁祸首是中国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 国航计划配股至多8.42亿美元购买飞机以增加资本
item.description: Air China , plans to raise up to 6.0 billion yuan ($842 million) in a private share sale on the Shanghai Stock Exchange to expand its fleet and replenish working capital, it said on Friday.翻译:中国国际航空公司周五表示，计划在上海证券交易所通过非公开发行股票筹集至多60亿元人民币（8.42亿美元），以扩大机队规模并补充营运资金。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尽管美中军事对话恢复，台湾和南中国海仍隐现危险
item.description: A resumption of military dialogue between China and the United States could help mitigate some tensions, but fundamental differences over Taiwan and the South China Sea still loom as dangerous potential flashpoints, Chinese and Asian analysts say.翻译:中国和亚洲分析人士表示，中美恢复军事对话可能有助于缓解部分紧张局势，但台湾和南中国海问题上的根本分歧仍然存在，成为危险的潜在爆发点。
item.author: Yew Lun Tian, James Pomfret

item.title: 比亚迪将在匈牙利建设新能源汽车生产基地
item.description: Chinese electric vehicle giant BYD is to build a new energy vehicle production base in Hungary, it said on Friday.翻译:中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪周五表示，将在匈牙利建设新能源汽车生产基地。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国吉利警告红海袭击将推迟欧洲电动汽车发货
item.description: Chinese automaker Geely warned on Friday its EV sales are likely to be impacted by a delay in deliveries due to the "situation" in the Red Sea, where Yemeni militants are attacking vessels, forcing shippers to take longer, more expensive routes.翻译:中国汽车制造商吉利周五警告称，由于红海“局势”，也门武装分子正在袭击船只，迫使托运人采取更长、更昂贵的航线，其电动汽车销售可能会受到交付延迟的影响。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾与加拿大签署具有里程碑意义的双边投资协议
item.description: Taiwan and Canada on Friday signed a bilateral investment deal, boosting the Taiwanese government's efforts to bolster business ties with like-minded democratic partners and possibly easing the island's entry into a major pan-Pacific trade pact.翻译:台湾和加拿大周五签署了双边投资协议，推动了台湾政府加强与志同道合的民主伙伴的商业关系的努力，并可能为台湾加入一项重要的泛太平洋贸易协定提供便利。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 土地所有者投诉后，中国公司被禁止瓦努阿图原木出口
item.description: A Chinese company began logging in Vanuatu during recent political turmoil, residents said, raising concern over the environment and workers in military uniforms in a Pacific Island nation where Beijing and Washington vie for influence.翻译:当地居民表示，在最近的政治动荡期间，一家中国公司开始在瓦努阿图进行伐木活动，这引发了人们对这个太平洋岛国的环境和穿着军装的工人的担忧，而北京和华盛顿正在争夺影响力。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 特斯拉获得上海土地用于大型电池工厂
item.description: Tesla has acquired land in Shanghai for a megapack battery manufacturing plant with production expected to start in the fourth quarter of 2024, Chinese state media reported on Friday.翻译:据中国官方媒体周五报道，特斯拉已在上海购买了一座大型电池制造工厂的土地，预计将于 2024 年第四季度开始生产。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 波音自2019年以来首架交付中国的梦想客机抵达
item.description: Boeing's first direct delivery of a 787 Dreamliner to China since 2019 landed in Shanghai on Friday, a step that could hasten the end of China's freeze on deliveries of the firm's profitable 737 MAX after more than four years.翻译:波音公司自 2019 年以来首架直接向中国交付的 787 梦想客机于周五在上海降落，此举可能会加速中国对该公司盈利的 737 MAX 交付冻结四年多的局面的结束。
item.author: Sophie Yu, Lisa Barrington

item.title: 中国宣布减少视频游戏支出的规定
item.description: Chinese regulators announced on Friday a wide range of rules aimed at curbing spending and rewards that encourage video games, dealing a blow to the world's biggest games market, which returned to growth this year.翻译:中国监管机构周五宣布了一系列旨在限制鼓励电子游戏的支出和奖励的规定，这对今年恢复增长的全球最大游戏市场造成了打击。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 随着中国气温攀升，刺骨的寒冷放松了控制
item.description: After almost two weeks of below-freezing weather brought by a cold wave that swept through most of China, a round of warm air will begin to flow from the country's north to south lifting temperatures from the weekend.翻译:寒潮席卷中国大部分地区，带来近两周零度以下的天气，从周末开始，一轮暖空气将开始从中国北部向南部流动，气温将升高。
item.author: Liz Lee

item.title: 香港法院驳回撤销黎智英煽动叛乱指控的请求
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Friday rejected a bid by the legal team for pro-democracy tycoon Jimmy Lai to have sedition charge against him dropped.翻译:香港一家法院周五驳回了法律团队要求撤销对民主大亨黎智英煽动叛乱指控的请求。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Dorothy Kam

item.title: 中国汽车制造商将反抗巨大的脱钩
item.description: It has become a truism that China and the United States are engaged in a great uncoupling. In strategically sensitive areas, from microchips to telecoms equipment, a wedge has already been driven between the two superpowers. But car companies – and specifically electric vehicles – could sketch out the limits of American protectionism.翻译:中美大脱钩已成为不言而喻的事实。在从微芯片到电信设备等战略敏感领域，两个超级大国之间已经产生了分歧。但汽车公司 — — 特别是电动汽车 — — 可以勾勒出美国保护主义的界限。
item.author: Jonathan Guilford

item.title: 中美气候关系为美国大选和特使更换做好准备
item.description: The U.S. and China have delivered big wins in climate diplomacy through the unique relationship of their chief climate envoys, but the two countries are bracing for change as the Chinese envoy retires and the U.S. readies for an election.翻译:美国和中国通过首席气候特使的独特关系在气候外交上取得了巨大胜利，但随着中国特使退休和美国准备大选，两国正在为变革做好准备。
item.author: Valerie Volcovici, David Stanway

item.title: 美国表示，中国在台湾问题上的语气没有任何变化
item.description: Washington does not see any change in China's tone on Taiwan, U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo told CNBC on Thursday when asked about media reports that Chinese President Xi Jinping told President Joe Biden that Beijing will reunify Taiwan with China.翻译:美国商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多周四在被问及有关中国国家主席习近平告诉总统乔·拜登北京将实现台湾与中国统一的媒体报道时告诉 CNBC，华盛顿认为中国在台湾问题上的态度没有任何变化。
item.author: Kanishka Singh

item.title: 中国进口担忧促使美国启动半导体供应链审查
item.description: The U.S. Department of Commerce said Thursday it will launch a survey of the U.S. semiconductor supply chain and national defense industrial base to address national security concerns from Chinese-sourced chips.翻译:美国商务部周四表示，将对美国半导体供应链和国防工业基础展开调查，以解决来自中国芯片的国家安全担忧。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 中美高级军事官员一年多来首次讲话
item.description: U.S. officials hope the meeting could lead to a broader restoration of ties between the two militaries.翻译:美国官员希望这次会议能够促成两国军队之间更广泛的关系恢复。
item.author: Phil Stewart, Doina Chiacu
